Contact

Represents a contact of the current user

Summary
ContactRepresents a contact of the current user
Functions
has_elementReturns true if an element exists which contains information about this contact.
get_nicknameReturns the current nickname of the contact.
update_nicknameUpdate all elements which contain the nickname of the Contact
update_statusUpdate all elements which contain the status of the Contact
update_followingUpdate all elements which show the follow status of the Contact
update_avatarUpdate all elements which contain the avatar of a specified Contact
ExampleOSWClient
Functions
get_contactReturns a contact
ExampleOSWCLient. add_activityCallback for when a new microblogging activity is received.
ExampleOSWCLient. add_groupAdd’s a contact to a specific group
ExampleOSWCLient. create_group_elementCreates a DOM element which is part of a list of groups.

Functions

has_element

has_element: function()

Returns true if an element exists which contains information about this contact.

get_nickname

get_nickname: function()

Returns the current nickname of the contact.  If no nickname has been received then the JID will be returned.

update_nickname

update_nickname: function()

Update all elements which contain the nickname of the Contact

update_status

update_status: function()

Update all elements which contain the status of the Contact

update_following

update_following: function()

Update all elements which show the follow status of the Contact

update_avatar

update_avatar: function()

Update all elements which contain the avatar of a specified Contact

Summary
Functions

Functions

get_contact

get_contact = function(jid)

Returns a contact

ExampleOSWCLient. add_activity

Callback for when a new microblogging activity is received.

See: OneSocialWeb.callback.activity

ExampleOSWCLient. add_group

Add’s a contact to a specific group

ExampleOSWCLient. create_group_element

Creates a DOM element which is part of a list of groups.
